summary: A resource full of fantastic upper class furniture pieces by Monk_Ide and Icecreamassassin
descriptionHtml:
This resource was originally created by Monk_ide and can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63255/?]HERE[/url]

I was given permission to take over this resource and make some updates to it, which I have. This package includes:

V2.1 update

- Fixed embedded sound issue with glass doors
- Included new double door trophy case


Fixes in V2:

- Fixed all micro seams
- Re-mapped UV's on several parts of most models
- Added additional content marked in [color=#00ff00]green[/color] below
- Modified desk drawers to not be stuck behind the legs (aesthetics)

Contains:

- 3 [color=#00ff00]varied height[/color] book shelves
- 2 [color=#00ff00]varied height[/color] heavy book cases
[color=#00ff00]- 1 heavy book case with animated door for storage[/color]
- 2 chairs (one front accessible with arms and [color=#00ff00]one front and side without[/color])
- 2 dressers
- 2 Beds (one [color=#00ff00]color variation on canopy[/color])
- 1 night stand (static and drawer [color=#00ff00]animated version[/color])
- 1 Desk
[color=#00ff00]- Hollow (no drawers) versions of the two dressers and desk with modular drawers that can be inserted into the model in the CK[/color]
[color=#00ff00]- 1 multi purpose animated drawer set to width of the book cases[/color]
[color=#00ff00]- 1 set of glass cabinet doors[/color]

Permissions:

All of these assets are free to use in any mod as long as credit is given to both myself (Icecreamassassin) and Monk_ide. If you wish to make modifications to these assets, you must contact Monk_ide for permission. The only asset free to modify as you like are the glass doors which I made.

Credits:

Monk_ide for creating these awesome objects and for allowing me to clean them up and expand upon them. Also thanks to RonnieMagnum for communicating between us as there was a language barrier
author: Monk_ide and Icecreamassassin
